claims.claim: Hong Leong Bank became the first bank in Malaysia to offer fully digital account onboarding, eliminating physical branch visits
claims.quote: Hong Leong Bank and Hong Leong Islamic Bank have announced a historic milestone by becoming the first bank in Malaysia to offer a truly digital onboarding experience for Malaysians looking to open a bank account; eliminating the need for physical branch or Self-Service Terminal visits.

claims.claim: The digital onboarding process was simplified to just three steps through the Apply@HLB mobile app
claims.quote: With the 'Apply@HLB' mobile app, customers can open a bank account in three simple steps - verify identity with the national identity card and a selfie, fill in personal details and lastly, create a username and password for HLB Connect, the Bank's online and mobile banking platform.

claims.claim: The bank observed significant shift to digital banking over 7 months during the pandemic
claims.quote: We have seen a significant shift to digital banking over the past 7 months. Expanding our digital offerings with a first-of-its-kind digital account opening through eKYC will further propel the move to digital banking.

claims.claim: Hong Leong Bank's digital-at-the-core strategy successfully simplified customer interactions across channels and improved customer experience
claims.quote: Our digital-at-the-core strategy over the past few years has successfully enabled us to simplify how customers interact with us across channels of their choice and get a delightful experience.

claims.claim: HLF's customized digital platform for vehicle loans achieved a 300% increase in processed loans from S$99 million to S$400 million
claims.quote: For instance, a customised digital platform for vehicle loans achieved a 300% increase in processed loans, rising from S$99 million in 2023 to S$400 million in 2024.

claims.claim: The digital transformation streamlined operations and enhanced user experience through digital tools
claims.quote: This success highlights HLF's ability to streamline operations and enhance user experience through digital tools.

claims.claim: HLF's scalable infrastructure and partnerships reduce operational costs and enhance service quality
claims.quote: Its scalable infrastructure, coupled with partnerships like the one with WeBank, reduces operational costs and enhances service quality.
